## BundleItem interface

BundleItem defines an individual item in a bundle product.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BundleItem 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [option\_id?](./magento-api.bundleitem.option_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An ID assigned to each type of item in a bundle product. |
|  [options?](./magento-api.bundleitem.options.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[BundleItemOption](./magento-api.bundleitemoption.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An array of additional options for this bundle item. |
|  [position?](./magento-api.bundleitem.position.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> he relative position of this item compared to the other bundle items. |
|  [required?](./magento-api.bundleitem.required.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether the item must be included in the bundle. |
|  [sku?](./magento-api.bundleitem.sku.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The SKU of the bundle product. |
|  [title?](./magento-api.bundleitem.title.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The display name of the item. |
|  [type?](./magento-api.bundleitem.type.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The input type that the customer uses to select the item. Examples include radio button and checkbox. |
|  [uid?](./magento-api.bundleitem.uid.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['ID'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The unique ID for a <code>BundleItem</code> object. |
